paper_abstract: This paper presents a rigorous proof of existence and uniqueness of solutions to laminar boundary layer flow in power law non-Newtonian fluid. A theoretical estimate for skin friction coefficient is given, which is characterized by a power law exponent. The reliability and efficiency of the proposed estimate formula are verified by numerical results with a good agreement. The estimate formula can be successfully applied to give the value of the skin friction coefficient. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence and estimate of positive solutions to a nonlinear singular boundary value problem in the theory of dilatant non-Newtonian fluids
